pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:2.1: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:5.1: 12. The second training rule on laughing loudly
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:6.2: At that time the monks from the group of six were sitting in inhabited areas, laughing loudly. …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:7.2: “‘I will not laugh loudly while sitting in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:8.1: Sitting in an inhabited area, one should not laugh loudly.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:8.2: If a monk, out of disrespect, laughs loudly while sitting in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:9.9: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:10.1: The second training rule is finished.
